Asturian

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

revisar

  1. to revise; to check

Conjugation

[edit]
Conjugation of revisar
infinitive revisar
gerund revisando
past participle m revisáu, f revisada, n revisao, m pl revisaos, f pl revisaes
person first singular
yo 		second singular
tu 		third singular
él/elli 		first plural
nosotros/nós 		second plural
vosotros/vós 		third plural
ellos
indicative present reviso revises revisa revisamos revisáis revisen
imperfect revisaba revisabes revisaba revisábemos, revisábamos revisabeis, revisabais revisaben
preterite revisé revisasti, revisesti revisó revisemos revisastis, revisestis revisaron
pluperfect revisare, revisara revisares, revisaras revisare, revisara revisáremos, revisáramos revisareis, revisarais revisaren, revisaran
future revisaré revisarás revisará revisaremos revisaréis revisarán
conditional revisaría revisaríes revisaría revisaríemos, revisaríamos revisaríeis, revisaríais revisaríen
subjunctive present revise revises, revisas revise revisemos reviséis revisen, revisan
imperfect revisare, revisara revisares, revisaras revisare, revisara revisáremos, revisáramos revisareis, revisarais revisaren, revisaran
imperative — revisa — — revisái —

Related terms

[edit]
  • revisión

Further reading

[edit]
  • “revisar”, in Diccionariu de la llingua asturiana [Dictionary of the Asturian Language] (in Asturian), 1ª edición, Academia de la Llingua Asturiana, 2000, →ISBN

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

A learned formation stemming from Latin revisus (may also be seen as a compound of re- +‎ visar). Compare French réviser, Spanish revisar; cf. also Latin reviso, revisere.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [rə.βiˈza]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [rə.viˈza]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [re.viˈzaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)

Verb

[edit]

revisar (first-person singular present reviso, first-person singular preterite revisí, past participle revisat)

  1. to revise, check, go over

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of revisar (first conjugation)
infinitive revisar
gerund revisant
past participle masculine feminine
singular revisat revisada
plural revisats revisades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present reviso revises revisa revisem reviseu revisen
imperfect revisava revisaves revisava revisàvem revisàveu revisaven
future revisaré revisaràs revisarà revisarem revisareu revisaran
preterite revisí revisares revisà revisàrem revisàreu revisaren
conditional revisaria revisaries revisaria revisaríem revisaríeu revisarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present revisi revisis revisi revisem reviseu revisin
imperfect revisés revisessis revisés reviséssim reviséssiu revisessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — revisa revisi revisem reviseu revisin
negative (no) — no revisis no revisi no revisem no reviseu no revisin

Related terms

[edit]
  • revisió
  • reveure

Further reading

[edit]
  • “revisar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.
  • “revisar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “revisar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007

Latin

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

revīsar

  1. first-person singular future passive indicative of revīsō

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

A learned formation stemming from Latin revisus (may also be seen as a compound of re- +‎ visar). Compare French réviser, Spanish revisar; cf. also Latin reviso, revisere.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ʁe.viˈza(ʁ)/ [he.viˈza(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /ʁe.viˈza(ʁ)/ [he.viˈza(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /ʁe.viˈza(ɾ)/ [he.viˈza(ɾ)]
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /ʁe.viˈza(ʁ)/ [χe.viˈza(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /ʁe.viˈza(ɻ)/ [he.viˈza(ɻ)]
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.viˈzaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.viˈzaɾ/
    • (Northern Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.biˈzaɾ/ [ʁɨ.βiˈzaɾ]
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /ʁɨ.viˈza.ɾi/

Verb

[edit]

revisar (first-person singular present reviso, first-person singular preterite revisei, past participle revisado)

  1. to revise (to review, alter and amend, especially of written material)
  2. to review (to look broadly over)

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of revisar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)

Impersonal revisar
Personal revisar revisares revisar revisarmos revisardes revisarem
Gerund
revisando
Past participle
Masculine revisado revisados
Feminine revisada revisadas

Present reviso revisas revisa revisamos revisais revisam
Imperfect revisava revisavas revisava revisávamos revisáveis revisavam
Preterite revisei revisaste revisou revisamos1, revisámos2 revisastes revisaram
Pluperfect revisara revisaras revisara revisáramos revisáreis revisaram
Future revisarei revisarás revisará revisaremos revisareis revisarão
Conditional revisaria revisarias revisaria revisaríamos revisaríeis revisariam
Subjunctive
Present revise revises revise revisemos reviseis revisem
Imperfect revisasse revisasses revisasse revisássemos revisásseis revisassem
Future revisar revisares revisar revisarmos revisardes revisarem
Imperative
Affirmative revisa revise revisemos revisai revisem
Negative (não) não revises não revise não revisemos não reviseis não revisem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Related terms

[edit]
  • revisão
  • rever

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

A learned formation stemming from Latin revisus (may also be seen as a compound of re- +‎ visar). Compare French réviser; cf. also Latin reviso, revisere.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /rebiˈsaɾ/ [re.β̞iˈsaɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: re‧vi‧sar

Verb

[edit]

revisar (first-person singular present reviso, first-person singular preterite revisé, past participle revisado)

  1. to revise
  2. to review, to check
    Synonym: repasar
    • 2025 July 25, “La revisión del FMI y la expectativa por el desembolso: el análisis del economista Daniel Marx”, in CNN Radio Argentina‎[1], archived from the original on 25 July 2025:
      El economista Daniel Marx conversó con Pepe Gil Vidal y Mariana Arias sobre el acuerdo entre el FMI y el Gobierno nacional y dijo que “el anuncio de ayer” del organismo internacional “es muy importante”, aunque aclaró que “ahora el directorio deberá revisar algunas de las cuestiones a futuro como el caso de la acumulación de reservas del Banco Central”.
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)

[edit]

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

accusative revísenme not used revísenlo, revísenla revísennos not used revísenlos, revísenlas, revísense
